attributes.additional_details: These lock downs are draconian, unnecessary and are ruining people's lives and livelihoods. They are causing depression and widespread anger and total resentment.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Repeal second National Lockdown
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557045

Referendum on current restrictions and any further lockdowns
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551539

Lift local lockdowns and Covid-19 restrictions in England
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551469
